Snake Remastered 

Version: 1.0.1

Using Pygame Engine

Btw, I have learned also created this game in 80 hrs. I don't know any python code before. Now it has some bug but I will fix it soon!

How to play?

WASD: Move the snake

[Shift]: Boost the snake (Speed up but the food is run out faster)

Features:

- Food (if the snake doesn't eat for a while, it may be taken damaged (heart - 1))

- Level (Follow Score): After 1 level (no hardcore), a heart food will be shown 

- If hearts is run out or time up, the game will stop

A player can control:

Ingame: hardcore mode, playtime (may unlimited), total heart, and more...

More: Game UI (I have .xd asset file)
